definition: International Women's Day 婦女節|妇女节[Fu4 nu:3 jie2], 8th March/foolish/stupid
(coll.) Arisaka Type 38 rifle (Japanese army rifle used 1905-1945)
38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea

sentences.english: Is also the March Eighth delivers you ten catties iron.
sentences.chinese: 又是三八节，送你十斤铁。

sentences.english: Is also the March Eighth delivers you ten catties iron. Boils the pot nutrition soup makes up the calcium the blood tonic.
sentences.chinese: 又是三八节，送你十斤铁熬锅营养汤，补钙又补血。

sentences.english: March 8th was first celebrated as the International Women's Day in 1975.
sentences.chinese: 1975年，联合国开始庆祝“三八”国际妇女节。

sentences.english: Most of the fighting in the Korean War took place along the geographic line known as the thirty-eighth parallel.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜战争中，大多战役发生在人们所熟知的三八线上。

sentences.english: They drew a line in the sand —or rather, in this case, in the rugged terrain in the middle of the Korean peninsula —where the 38th parallel had been set down at Potsdam.
sentences.chinese: 他们在沙子上画了一条线，就是波茨坦定下的三八线。

sentences.english: Is also the March Eighth, delivers you ten catties iron.
sentences.chinese: 又是三八节，送你十斤铁。

sentences.english: Is also the March Eighth, delivers outen catties iron.
sentences.chinese: 又是三八节，送你十斤铁。

sentences.english: Canton fell to the Japanese in 1938, resulting in a mass flight of refugees to Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 一九三八年，广州沦陷，大批难民涌入香港。

sentences.english: Today we gather here to grandly celebrate the International Women's Day.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们汇聚一堂，隆重庆祝三八国际妇女节。

sentences.english: The first bundle of flower in my life should be a gift in women's day.
sentences.chinese: 生平第一次收到的花竟然是三八节的花。

sentences.english: All the woman teachers in our school are very happy on March 8.
sentences.chinese: 三八节我们学校所有女老师都很高兴。

sentences.english: My sister was produced in nineteen thirty-eight.
sentences.chinese: 我的妹妹是一九三八年诞生的。

sentences.english: Our first memorial 38 the international working women s day started in 1924.
sentences.chinese: 我国第一次纪念三八国际劳动妇女节始于1924年。

sentences.english: In nineteen thirty-eight, they traveled to Texas.
sentences.chinese: 在一九三八年，他们前往德克萨斯州。

sentences.english: Women's Day this year is Xu Xin passes the most dependably one day.
sentences.chinese: 今年的三八妇女节是徐新过得最踏实的一天。

definition: Youth Day (May 4th), PRC national holiday for young people aged 14 to 28, who get half a day off
